items.content_html: It's a Single Page Application created with CRA. Its purpose is to present the company - BatexInstalprojekt. It contains all the information in a lightweight form. For the time being, it's hosted on https://batex.netlify.app/. It might not be current version.

items.content_html: Web3API is a WASM standard for integrating Web3 protocols into applications. This eliminates the need for client-side SDKs, making dApps lightweight and multi-platform.
